settings.title: Lab-grown Diamonds.
settings.content: Coupleâ€™s lab-grown diamonds are atomically and chemically identical to mined diamonds, yet 35% larger on a price basis and meet the highest of standards. Compared to mined diamonds, Couple diamonds are eco-friendly, and 100% ethically produced and sourced.

settings.title: Our Diamond Seed
settings.content: Each Couple diamond is born from a thin sliver of an exceptional diamond.
